meanings.definition: Filled with stuffing or a mixture of ingredients.
meanings.sent1: The turkey was farci with delicious herbs and breadcrumbs.
meanings.sent2: The cake was farci with layers of creamy frosting.
meanings.sent3: The overstuffed chair looked farci with all the cozy pillows.
meanings.sent4: The garden was farci with colorful flowers, like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The suitcase was farci with clothes, bursting at the seams.

meanings.definition: To fill with stuffing or a mixture of ingredients.
meanings.sent1: She would farci the peppers with a savory rice filling.

meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally farcied the pasta with too much sauce, making it soggy.
